name: Median income at IETC upper threshold
description: Individual earning NZD 70,000 per year (at IETC upper limit, no credit)

sources.description: Calculated using 2025-26 PAYE rates, ACC levy, and IETC from IRD
sources.notes: PAYE: 10.5% up to $15,600 + 17.5% up to $53,500 + 30% up to $78,100. ACC: 1.67%. IETC: $0 at income of $70,000 (upper threshold).
